featured.text: Then she put on both her sweater and her coat so that she wouldn’t have to carry them.

definition.zh_def: 一種用毛線或其他纖維編織而成的衣物，通常用來保暖。
definition.en_def: A knitted garment typically made of wool or other fibers, worn to keep warm.
definition.example: She wore a cozy sweater on the chilly evening.
